column4: hello, I use Ubuntu 9.10 on old pc. It is very slow, AMD Athlon(TM) XP 2400+, 1 GB Ram... What can I do? I have a lot of lags on flash sites...
mmm u think I can update?
you could theoretically re-nice the plugin-container, but auronandace is right, installing LXDE instead of Gnome is a much better option
